description:
Mine Ryuutarou is 2nd-year violin student at Momogaoka academy, Mine is something of a prima donna whose violin technique is seen by himself to be deeply personal but by others to be simply sloppy. He is a member of the academy`s S-Orchestra and the Râ˜†S Orchestra. His father, http://anidb.net/ch2774 [Mine Tatsumi], owns a Chinese restaurant "Uraken" right next to the university.
Adapted from Wikipedia
name: Mine Ryuutarou
